headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for Bang & Olufsen (Beoplay) TVs and Speakers. See [the Readme](https://github.com/connectjunkie/homebridge-beoplay#readme) for limitations/side effects to be aware of

name.title: Name
name.description: What the device will be named in HomeKit

ip.title: IP Address
ip.description: The IP address of your device

type.title: (Optional) What device to display the B&O device as in HomeKit
type.description: Defaults to fan (for speakers) or tv (for TVs)

mode.title: (Optional) Whether to mute/unmute or to power on/standby a Speaker, Bulb or Fan when selected
mode.description: Defaults to Mute for speakers and smart speakers. Defaults to power on/standby for TVs, bulbs and fans

on.title: (Optional) Power on via setting an input, via the API, or by joining a multiroom experience
on.description: Defaults to API for speakers, smart speakers, bulbs, and fans. Defaults to via an input for TVs

oneOf.title: Power on via setting an input (default for TVs)
Power on via joining a multiroom experience

default.title: (Optional) Input used to power on the device by default (when using that functionality)

name.title: Name of the Input
name.description: The name to be displayed in the Home app

apiID.title: API id value from the BeoPlay API for the input
apiID.description: API id values can be looked up from your device using a browser at the URL path http://x.x.x.x:8080/BeoZone/Zone/ActiveSources/.  Example: bluetooth:1111.2222222.33333333@products.bang-olufsen.com

exclude.title: (Optional) Inputs to exclude for automatic setup

items.title: API id value to exclude
items.description: API id values can be looked up from your device using a browser at the URL path http://x.x.x.x:8080/BeoZone/Zone/ActiveSources/. Example: bluetooth:1111.2222222.33333333@products.bang-olufsen.com

id.title: id value for the speaker group
id.description: id values can be looked up from your device using a browser at the URL path http://x.x.x.x:8080/BeoZone/Zone/Sound/SpeakerGroup/

name.title: Name of the speaker group
name.description: The name to be used for the speaker group
